attributes.action: Close this site permanently or sack Douglas Alexander for ignoring the vehicle tracking and road-pricing petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of Douglas Alexander's stated intent to ignore the vehicle tracking and road-pricing policy petition, this site should be closed for being nothing more than a gimmick, or Douglas Alexander should be sacked for ignoring the will of the people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
